title: New Structures in the $J/\psi$ $J/\psi$ Mass Spectrum at CMS
abstract:
A search is reported for structures near the $J/\psi$ $J/\psi$ mass threshold
using a dataset of proton-proton collisions at $\sqrt{s} \: =13 \: \mathrm{TeV}
$ recorded with the CMS detector at the LHC, corresponding to an integrated
luminosity of about $135 \: \mathrm{fb^{-1}}$. Two structures are observed with
a significance exceeding $5\sigma$ and evidence of an additional structure is
reported with a local significance of $4.7\sigma$.
